li.a: School Calendar - Holidays & Student Free Days

div.p: Beginning March 16th, EMCSD will provide free breakfast and lunch to all children 18 and younger at pick-up sites across El Monte. EMCSD will be closed through the remainder of the school year, June 5th, 2020.

div.div: Beginning March 16th, EMCSD will provide free breakfast and lunch to all children 18 and younger at pick-up sites across El Monte. EMCSD will be closed through the remainder of the school year, June 5th, 2020.
Thank you for visiting our new district website!

img.alt: District Hosts Training Center Ribbon-cutting Featured Photo

div.div: EMCSD proudly presents new Professional Development Center to provide optimal learning environment for the community.

h3.a: Students Learn Coding, Engineering with Lego Robotics Program

div.div: District students are learning how mechanisms move, the complexities of coding and the limitless possibilities of their imaginations thanks to a new Lego Robotics program.

section.div: Welcome to the El Monte City School District! We are so happy that you are enrolling your child in our district, and are so eager to embark on this educational journey with you. Rest assured your child will receive an excellent education that will focus on academics, character and the arts. Please click on the link below to begin the enrollment process. Should you need further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us at (626) 453- 3741.
